data.name: CoH 2 - Soviet Commander: Tank Hunter Tactics
data.detailed_description:
Soviet Commander: Tank Hunter Tactics
Disable enemy tanks and armored vehicles more easily with a variety of upgrades and abilities to support existing AT options. Conscripts gain increased versatility against tanks, when that fails IL-2 planes can deliver a devastating anti-tank bombing run. With enemy vehicles defeated, engineers can scavenge the remains for parts for the soviet industry.

  • IL-2 PTAB Anti-Tank Bombing Run
    Drops a multitude of smaller anti-tank bombs over a wide area.
  • Engineer Salvage Kits
    Combat Engineers can be upgraded with Salvage Kits, allowing them to gather resources from vehicle wrecks.
  • RPG-40 Anti-Tank Grenade Assault
    Conscript squads can assault a target vehicle with multiple smaller RPG-40 anti-tank grenades.
  • Conscript PTRS Package
    Allow conscripts to upgrade to the PRTS anti-tank rifle.
  • PMD-6M Light Anti-Vehicle Mines
    Allows Combat Engineers and Conscripts to build cheap and quick to place anti-vehicle mines that will temporarily stop vehicles.

data.supported_languages:
Czech, English*, French*, German*, Italian, Polish*, Russian*, Spanish - Spain*
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
• OS: 32bit Vista
  • Processor: 2Ghz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent
  • Memory: 2GB RAM
  • Graphics: 512MB Direct3D 10 capable video card (GeForce 8800 GT or Radeon HD 2900XT)
  • DirectX®: 11
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection
pc_requirements.recommended:
• Memory: 4GB RAM
  • Processor: 3Ghz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent
  • Graphics: 1024 MB Direct3D 11 capable video card (GeForce GTX 470 or Radeon HD 5850)
  • OS: 64bit Windows 7
  • Internet: Broadband Internet connection
  • Hard Drive: 30GB free Hard disc space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 1.8Ghz Intel
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 512MB (Nvidia 6xx series or later, AMD 7xxx series or later and Intel Iris Pro).
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS OS X 10.10.3
  • Processor 2.4Ghz Intel
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB (Nvidia 780MX, AMD D700 or R9 295X)
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 2.6 GHz Intel Core2 Duo or equivalent.
  • RAM 4GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 1GB*
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    *Requires an Intel Iris Pro graphics card or an NVIDIA 600 series graphics card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended Requirements
  • OS Ubuntu 14.04 (64bit) or SteamOS
  • Processor 3.4 GHz Intel i5 quad core or equivalent.
  • RAM 8GB
  • Hard Disk 35GB
  • Graphics 4GB**
  • Internet Broadband Internet connection
  • Input Keyboard & Mouse
    **NVIDIA 760 series card or better with driver version 352.21 or later.
